abstract.p: KeySpan Corp, based in Hicksville and Brooklyn, NY, joins Standard and Poor's 500 index (S)

block.p: The Standard and Poor's 500 index now includes the KeySpan Corporation (NYSE: KSE) in its natural gas industry group.

''We are pleased with this announcement by the S.&P.,'' said Robert B. Catell, chairman and chief executive of KeySpan, ''and we believe it reflects the fact we have had significant growth during the last few years as we've implemented our strategic plan to become the premier energy company of the Northeast.''
The Standard and Poor's 500 index now includes the KeySpan Corporation (NYSE: KSE) in its natural gas industry group.

''We are pleased with this announcement by the S.&P.,'' said Robert B. Catell, chairman and chief executive of KeySpan, ''and we believe it reflects the fact we have had significant growth during the last few years as we've implemented our strategic plan to become the premier energy company of the Northeast.''
KeySpan, with bases in Hicksville and Brooklyn, is a holding company that includes two utilities that distribute natural gas to 1.6 million customers in New York City and on Long Island.
